name: AMESCI INTERNATIONAL MOVEMENT
goal: AIM is a European Network of legal entities with the goal to tackle youth issues through Open Society, Open Knowledge, Entrepreneurship and Liquid Democracy through advocacy and an operational platform, giving a voice and better chances to its members to engage in society and civic life, with greater understanding and political involvement in the European project and reinforce its core values, cooperation and solidarity in Europe and in the World.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Communication, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Sport, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives: AIM, attraverso i propri partner, partecipa a numerose iniziative legate a programmi giovanili quali, ad esempio, Erasmus+. Aim pone al centro delle proprie attività la campagna per la promozione di un Servizio Civile Europeo attualmente in via di sperimentazione attraverso il progetto IVO4ALL (erasmus+ KA2) promosso da Italia, Francia, Lussemburgo, Lituania, Gran Bretagna. Amesci è soggetto attuatore di IVO4ALL.
